DOC.brief_title: Comparison Four Different Smoking Cessation Programmes
DOC.detailed_description: Smoking remain important threat public health . The majority smoker wish quit smoke every year substantial part smoker make quit attempt . However , majority smoker try quit unassisted exist smoke cessation intervention underused . In study test effectiveness four different smoke cessation intervention randomize controlled trial . The study provide knowledge factor important recruitment give indication potential reach intervention among general population . This knowledge help u design intervention effective also high reach general population .
